sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均可表示"可尊敬的"之意。
means: respectable ： 指因品质、人格或身份等高尚或高贵而受到他人的尊敬。
respectful ： 指对人表示尊敬或敬意。

sentence.Network_en: He was now a teacher and a respectable member of the community.
sentence.Network_cn: 他现在是一位教师，并且是社区内受人尊敬的一员。

sentence.Network_en: I have to prove myself as a respectable, balanced, person.
sentence.Network_cn: 我必须证明自己是个正派、稳重的人。

sentence.Network_en: He depicted the town's respectable families in an unflattering light.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在描述镇上体面人家时满是贬抑之词。

entry.def: Someone or something that is respectable is approved of by society and considered to be morally correct.

example.ex: He came from a perfectly respectable middle-class family...
example.tran: 他出身于一个非常正派的中产阶级家庭。

example.ex: It was a highly respectable and what was called an 'old-fashioned' hotel situated not far from Piccadilly.
example.tran: 这是一家非常体面的“老式”旅馆，坐落在离皮卡迪利广场不远的地方。

entry.tran: 好的;可观的;令人满意的
entry.def: You can say that something is respectable when you mean that it is good enough or acceptable.

example.ex: ...investments that offer respectable rates of return...
At last I have something respectable to wear!
example.tran: 我终于可以穿上体面的衣服了！

means.word_mean: 3. large in amount or extent or degree;

auth_sentence.content: Respectable people With the right crimp in their napkins.
auth_sentence.res_content: Respectable people With the right crimp in their napkins.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Respectable people With the right crimp in their napkins.

auth_sentence.content: Respectable vices...need nothing so much as the stern iconoclast.
auth_sentence.res_content: Respectable vices...need nothing so much as the stern iconoclast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Respectable vices...need nothing so much as the stern iconoclast.

auth_sentence.content: Three rear-admirals made a respectable tally of naval magnificos.
auth_sentence.res_content: Three rear-admirals made a respectable tally of naval magnificos.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three rear-admirals made a respectable tally of naval magnificos.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

Sentence.sentence: Each interactive textbook is a media-heavy experience built from the ground up, and you can tell that it takes a respectable amount of manpower to put together each one.

sentences.cn: 诚实的人是值得尊敬的。

sentences.en: He was respectable and no one questioned.
sentences.cn: 他品格高尚, 没有人怀疑。

means.word_mean: 有名望的，有相当身份的

sentences.en: He was adopted into a respectable family.
sentences.cn: 他被一个有声望的家族所收养。

sentences.en: He got into trouble for seducing the daughter of a respectable tradesman.
sentences.cn: 他因为引诱一个有名望的商人的女儿而惹上了麻烦。

means.word_mean: 体面的；得体的；值得尊敬的

sentences.en: I must go and put on a clean shirt and make myself look respectable.
sentences.cn: 我得去换件干净的衬衫, 让自己看上去体面些。

sentences.en: His savings were just enough to pay for a respectable funeral.
sentences.cn: 他的存款刚好够办一个体面的葬礼。

sentences.en: It was an eminently respectable boarding school.
sentences.cn: 这是所非常好的寄宿学校。
